data: [[2634950,[["ACHIEVE_000007",{"strName":"最速的稱號","strDescription":"擊敗【機光王】，到達結局。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/07039b6885ed9499939735d3585aabf74d14c1bd.jpg","flAchieved":15.199999809265137,"bHidden":true,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000007"}],["ACHIEVE_000014",{"strName":"勝利就是一切","strDescription":"與對手的戰斗勝利次數達到500次。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":13.5,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000014"}],["ACHIEVE_000006",{"strName":"交錯的思緒","strDescription":"擊敗【紅色惡魔】【NAMAHAGE】【堅持到底】。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/a2ff247143f9d12bf15ad987a51e7c344f9f5e43.jpg","flAchieved":16.799999237060547,"bHidden":true,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000006"}],["ACHIEVE_000012",{"strName":"流浪者獵人","strDescription":"擊敗10個流浪者。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":26.200000762939453,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000012"}],["ACHIEVE_000021",{"strName":"愛的力量系統","strDescription":"駕駛同一輛車輛行駛1,000km以上。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":13.899999618530273,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000021"}],["ACHIEVE_000005",{"strName":"四處流傳的謠言","strDescription":"擊敗【鋼鐵心】【鐵翁】【傳言作家】。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/a2ff247143f9d12bf15ad987a51e7c344f9f5e43.jpg","flAchieved":20,"bHidden":true,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000005"}],["ACHIEVE_000044",{"strName":"關鍵一步","strDescription":"在後面持續推其他車輛1km。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":14.300000190734863,"bHidden":true,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000044"}],["ACHIEVE_000004",{"strName":"深夜零點的約定","strDescription":"擊敗【午夜後的灰姑娘】。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":33.79999923706055,"bHidden":true,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000004"}],["ACHIEVE_000003",{"strName":"混沌的徵兆","strDescription":"擊敗【獵血犬】【金色般若】【迷幻驅動】【快樂紳士】。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":39.900001525878906,"bHidden":true,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000003"}],["ACHIEVE_000036",{"strName":"先發制人","strDescription":"連續10場對戰成功發動「FIRST ATTACK」並贏得勝利。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":30.399999618530273,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000036"}],["ACHIEVE_000029",{"strName":"連勝之路","strDescription":"達成10連勝。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":39.79999923706055,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000029"}],["ACHIEVE_000031",{"strName":"瞬間落幕","strDescription":"在30秒內贏得戰斗。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":46.599998474121094,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000031"}],["ACHIEVE_000030",{"strName":"撞墻人生","strDescription":"多次碰撞牆後仍獲勝。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":46,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000030"}],["ACHIEVE_000038",{"strName":"優雅過彎","strDescription":"連續5個彎道成功「CLEAN CORNERING」。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":37.5,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000038"}],["ACHIEVE_000002",{"strName":"靈魂的邂逅","strDescription":"擊敗【滾動大師】【紅童子】【永遠的北極星】。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":47.599998474121094,"bHidden":true,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000002"}],["ACHIEVE_000039",{"strName":"刺激成癮","strDescription":"在不接觸其他車輛或墻壁等任何地方的情況下，連續10場成功「NEAR MISS」。","strImage":"https://shared.steamstatic.com/community_assets/images/apps/2634950/587269d28f12943c3f261b32751fa166d0903636.jpg","flAchieved":11.800000190734863,"strID":"ACHIEVE_000039"}]]]]

data.strFullDescription: [p]『首都高賽車』是以被封鎖的未來東京為舞台，在穿梭於都市間的高速公路上，駕駛自豪的改裝車爭奪最速，以登上頂點為目標的競速遊戲。[/p][p]在高度還原的賽道上，駕駛著真實存在的車輛，與強大的對手們競爭，[/p][p]穿梭於其他車輛之間，進行讓精神緊繃到極限的激烈對戰。[/p][p]這是一部擁有獨一無二魅力的系列作品。[/p][p]目前，新作『首都高賽車』正在製作中。敬請期待更多情報的公開。[/p][p][/p][p]・削減精力的SP戰鬥[/p][p]SP戰鬥是……[/p][p]與一般競速遊戲不同，將駕駛的精力數值化，並互相削減精力值的獨特戰鬥系統。[/p][p]光靠速度無法取勝，必須掌握各種削減對手精力值的策略。[/p][p][/p][p]・馳騁於夜晚的首都環狀線[/p][p]忠實還原的首都環狀線。[/p][p]錯綜複雜的彎道和劇烈的高低差變化，帶來宛如現實般白熱化競速體驗。[/p][p][/p][p]・充滿神秘魅力的眾多對手[/p][p]與擁有各自特色車輛和獨特駕駛風格的對手們對戰，閃燈就是對戰開始的信號。[/p][p][/p][p]以下為已確認的設備[/p][list][*][p]Fanatec® CSL DD wheel base[/p][/*][*][p]HORI® Wireless Racing Wheel Apex for PlayStation®4 / PC[/p][/*][*][p]HORI® Force Feedback Truck Control System for Windows® PC[/p][/*][*][p]Logitech G® G29 Driving Force[/p][/*][*][p]Logitech G® G923 TRUEFORCE Racing Wheel[/p][/*][*][p]Logitech G® PRO Racing Wheel[/p][/*][*][p]MOZA R5 DD wheel base[/p][/*][*][p]Thrustmaster® T248[/p][/*][*][p]Thrustmaster® T300 RS[/p][/*][/list]
data.strSnippet: 『首都高賽車』是以被封鎖的未來東京為舞台，在穿梭於都市間的高速公路上，駕駛愛車追逐最速的競速遊戲。 在高度還原的賽道上，駕駛著真實存在的車輛，與強大的對手們競爭，進行讓精神緊繃到極限的激烈對戰。 這是一部擁有獨一無二魅力的系列作品。
